meanings.definition: Having or showing superior intellectual or cultural interests or tastes.
meanings.sent1: The highbrowed professor always discussed complex theories in class.
meanings.sent2: She attended highbrowed art exhibitions to appreciate fine paintings.
meanings.sent3: The highbrowed cat insisted on only eating gourmet cat food.
meanings.sent4: Her highbrowed taste in music made her a fan of classical composers.
meanings.sent5: The highbrowed book club only read challenging literary works.

meanings.definition: A person who has or is thought to have superior intellectual or cultural interests or tastes.
meanings.sent1: The highbrowed at the party discussed philosophy all night.
meanings.sent2: She was considered a highbrowed for her love of foreign films.
meanings.sent3: The highbrowed in the office always recommended obscure books.
meanings.sent4: He was the highbrowed of the group, always quoting famous authors.
meanings.sent5: The highbrowed in the neighborhood hosted intellectual discussions.
